data.title: How do I subscribe?
data.descr:
You can subscribe to 'NTV Clasicos Swipe & Win' service by:
Visiting https://www.ntvclasicos.com
Dial *482*1# from your Safaricom mobile number
Send Goal to 21389 from your Safaricom mobile number

data.title: What is the duration of the service?
What are the prizes?
data.descr:
NTV Clasicos Swipe & Win service gives away:

  • Weekly Gadgets worth 50,000 KES
  • A Monthly football trip worth 300,000 KES
  • A Grand Prize 1,000,000 KES CASH

data.title: If I win how will I be informed?
data.descr: The winner will be contacted by NTV in the next days as to explain the process needed. So do not worry, just keep your phone on.

data.title: How many times may I win each prize?
data.descr: A participant may win each prize more than once.

data.title: How can I change the language of participation?
data.descr:
If you are participating in English and you want to switch to Swahili, send the keyword SW to the short-code 21389.

If you are participating in Swahili and you want to switch to English, send the keyword EN to the short-code 21389.

data.title: What are the NTV Clasicos Swipe & Win game rules?
data.descr:
Each game lasts for 55 seconds.

Each question is consisted of a statement and a photo.

User has to Swipe right for Correct or left for Wrong.

Be careful! Every wrong reply deducts 5 seconds from the remaining time!

During a game round, special questions may also be served such as bronze, silver and golden ones.

data.title: Does my NTV Clasicos Swipe & Win credits expire?
data.descr: Both awarded and purchased Swipe & Win credits expire after 24 hours if not consumed until then.

data.title: I consume my daily credit, can I add more?
data.descr: You can purchase an extra NTV Clasicos Swipe & Win credit only for 10 KES upon consuming your available daily credit.

data.title: How can I unsubscribe?
data.descr: To cancel your 'NTV Clasicos Swipe & Win' subscription, send 'STOP' to the short code 21389.

data.title: I'm not a Safaricom subscriber, may I participate to the service?
data.descr: No, if you are not a Safaricom subscriber unfortunately you cannot subscribe to the service.
